noAccounts.title: No Accounts
noAccounts.message: You don't have any accounts yet.

noRecent.title: No Recent Recipients
noRecent.message: You haven't sent to anyone recently.

noSearchResults.title: No Results
noSearchResults.message: No accounts or contacts match your search

send.sameAddress: Cannot send to the same address
send.creator: Creator
send.title: Send
send.firstTimeSendMessage: We noticed this may be your first time sending to this address. Please confirm the destination address.
send.noNFTSelected: No NFT selected. Please go back and select an NFT to send.

generic.title: Something went wrong
generic.message: We encountered an unexpected error. Please try again.

network.title: Connection Error
network.message: Unable to connect to the network. Please check your connection and try again.

critical.title: Critical Error
critical.message: A critical error occurred. Please restart the app.

nft.collectionEmpty: This collection doesn't contain any NFTs
nft.noCollectionSelected: No collection selected. Please go back and select an NFT collection.
nft.noAccountSelected: No account address available. Please select an account.

notFound.title: NFT Not Found
notFound.message: The requested NFT could not be found or loaded

warning.title: Storage Warning
warning.balance: Your account is below the minimum FLOW balance required for its storage usage, which may cause subsequent transactions to fail.
warning.storage: This action may fail because it may reduce the amount of FLOW in your account below what is required to cover its storage usage.
warning.storageAfterAction: Account balance will fall below the minimum FLOW required for storage after this transaction, causing this transaction to fail.

dialog.title: Account Compatibility
dialog.descriptionMain: Flow Wallet manages your EVM and your Cadence accounts on Flow. EVM accounts are compatible with EVM apps, and Cadence accounts are compatible with Cadence apps.
dialog.descriptionSecondary: If an application is on EVM or Cadence, only compatible accounts will be available to connect.

surge.title: Surge price active
surge.message: Due to high network activity, transaction fees are elevated. Current network fees are 4x higher than usual.

modal.title: Are you really sure that you want to continue with surge pricing?
modal.description: Due to high network activity, transaction fees are elevated, and Flow Wallet is temporarily not paying for your gas. Current network fees are {{multiplier}}Ã— higher than usual.
modal.holdToAgree: Hold to agree to surge pricing
